item.description:
David Spahr, active contributing member of this group, has just published his book Edible and Medicinal Mushrooms of New England and Eastern Canada. Please join us for a social session to meet David and hear him talk about mushrooms and the path that led him to write this book. You can purchase a signed copy from David.

Portland Location - Being Confirmed.

This is not a potluck event but if you would like to bring a beverage to share, that would be great. I'll have a selection of teas (bring your mug).

You can read more about the book here or purchase a copy if you won't make it to the signing:
http://www.randomhous...

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Book Signing with Our Own David Spahr
